item.title: (Help) taking out items in ps
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Item.CFG contains values. It’s where you change strength bonuses, prayer bonuses, ect. Also it is where you change shop prices; you can look up item ID’s you wanna spawn too.

Npc.CFG contains values also. However, it only contains 4-5.

Npcid Npcname combat health (and on some respawn)

NOTE! Npcname will NOT change the name of the npc in-game it’s more for personal reference if you wanna change your npc names it’s in class 5 of your Client.

SO! To spawn npcs in-game go to Autospawn.CFG and look at it. Study it for a bit and go to Npc.CFG and pick a npc. Select the npc you want and look at the id of the npc. Study your Autospawn.CFG more and take note of things you see in common. You should be able to take it from there.

The key to being a successful coder is to not rush, examine everything you do, find common attributes, analyze, and use common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) taking out items in ps
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

To take items out of shops go to Shops.CFG and take them out. It should look like:

item amount item amount

be sure to Tab after you enter an item/amount.

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) taking out items in ps
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Go to your Client.Java in your source.

Search for:

case 185:

Under that add this:

actionButtonId = Misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR USERNAME HERE")) { printOut("Actionbutton " + actionButtonId);

Now when you click on a button like a teleport look on the cmd your server is running from and it should say the action button id. An actionbutton is something that you can click that triggers something.

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) taking out items in ps
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Item.CFG server-sided, and class 8 (or one of the ones between 1-10) for swapping out ids of custom items.

item.title: (Help) taking out items in ps
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

  1. Do you mean replacing ids with each other or swapping out ids?

  2. Look at your other commands that teleport you to somewhere if you have any. Find your player-rights method. Combine the two.

  3. If you mean emotes then good-luck doing them on a 317 server.

You must be new here good-luck, Razzle.
